permissions.message:
HappyHamster works best if you activate your GPS location and allow us to store cookies.
You can find more information about how we use cookies under 'Legal'.
Please also allow access to your location in your internet browser.
permissions.title: Permissions

high.safety-distance: Safety distance of 1.5m can't be guaranteed.

cookies.forbidden: from now on we no longer store cookies in your browser. You can change this setting at any time.

gps.default: HappyHamster wasn't abled to locate you via GPS because of an unkown error.
gps.not-supported: HappyHamster wasn't abled to locate you via GPS because your browser doesn't support it :(
gps.permission-denied: Please allow HappyHamster to locate you. To do that, either reload the page or go to the browser settings.
gps.position-unavailable: HappyHamster wasn't abled to locate you via GPS.
gps.timeout: It took to long to locate you via GPS. Please try it again.

map.error: An error occurred while updating the map. Sorry :(
map.not-found: Unfortunately we couldn't  find the shop you were looking for :(
map.zoom: Please zoom closer into the map.

occupancy-report.failure: Sorry, that didn't work. Please try again!
occupancy-report.invalid: Please tell us your personal occupancy estimation :)
